content: प्रयोक्तृ {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} One who uses or employs (as a means, word &c.). {@--2@} One who performs or directs, an executor. {@--3@} One who prompts or instigates, an instigator. {@--4@} An author, an agent; <ls>U. 3. 48.</ls> {@--5@} One who acts or represents (a drama). {@--6@} One who lends money at interest, a money-lender. {@--7@} One who shoots (an arrow). {@--8@} The agent of an action. {@--9@} A reciter.
